title: 4-Year Integrated Teacher Education Program (ITEP) B.Sc.-B.Ed. Admission 2024-25

notice.summary: Applications invited for admission to the 4-Year ITEP B.Sc.-B.Ed. program at NIT Agartala based on NCET 2024 conducted by NTA.

eligibility.academic: Class XII (10+2) or equivalent with minimum 50% in best five subjects including Physics, Chemistry, Mathematics
eligibility.state_of_eligibility: Based on state from where Class XII (or equivalent) was passed. For Open Schooling candidates, state of the examination center is considered.

online_application.login_credentials: Application ID and password sent via email
online_application.submission: Filled online form generates PDF to be printed and brought on reporting day
documents_required: Class XII mark sheet/grade card and pass certificate
Proof of State of eligibility (including Open School admit card if applicable)
online_application.document_instructions: All documents must be scanned into a single PDF file. Certificates not in English/Hindi require attested translation.

selection_procedure: Based on total score in NCET-2024
Tie-breaker: Older candidate gets preference; if still tied, higher marks in Mathematics, Physics, and Chemistry at Higher Secondary level

tentative_schedule.event: Start of registration, online application, and application fee payment
Last date for submission of online application
Round 1: Publication of list of provisionally selected candidates
Acceptance of allotted seat via MIS Portal by payment of semester fee

fee_details.payment_mode: MIS portal as seat acceptance fee
fee_details.note: Non-payment or incomplete process leads to seat cancellation

general_instructions: Contact Chief Warden for hostel/mess accommodation and fees: chiefwardennita@gmail.com
Preference may be given to candidates who opted for NIT Agartala while applying for NCET 2024
Produce all original documents on reporting day
Institute Fee once deposited is non-refundable
Technical issues for online application/payment: nitmisagt@gmail.com
Check Institute website regularly for updates
